p: The pretest risk of lung cancer is dependent especially on the smoking duration, age, sex, family history of lung cancer. [ 12, 13] The inclusion criteria should define a population of participants with the highest risk of lung cancer who are capable of undergoing curative treatment if cancer is found. The recommended threshold by the UK Lung Cancer Screening Trial was based on the prediction result of at least 5% risk of developing lung cancer in the following 5 years. [ 12]
